Electricity: Outlets, lamps, change of electrical wiring, switches, electrical installations from scratch, consumption calculations.

Plumbing: PVC, CPVC and copper pipe installations, common repairs, changes of toilet bowls, sinks, pumps, water tanks, faucets.

Welding: Creation of doors, protections, stairs, frames, shelves, work tables and cabinets, common repairs.

Paint: Acrylic, vinyl, epoxy and waterproofing.

Knowledged: Blueprint Reading, CAD, Programmable Logic Controllers.

Programs: Mastercam, Solidworks, Visualstudio, Excel, Word, Github.

Machines: CNC Machines (Lathe, Mill), Water Jet, IDM, Electrical Machines, Manual Mill and lathe.
